name: the earth warior
description:
this game is made for the blackthornprod 3 game jam!

controls:
W and D -> move
left click -> shoot

defend the earth from enemies!

thanks for futsuunohito for making the space music that is used in the game
and thank you for playing!

Game engine: Godot
Art: GraphicsGale
music: BeepBox
SFX: sfxr
